tourBios.carHigh:
Played on Adams Golf Tour 2008-2013.

2012: Qualified for the U.S. Open played at The Olympic Club in San Francisco (missed cut)...Also played on the NGA Pro Tour and won the Players Tour at Stonebridge. 

2011: Missed the cut at his Web.com Tour debut, the Wichita Open...Won the Beaumont Open on the Adams Golf Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named National Junior College All-American honors in 2005-2006...Won the 2005 Andrews Collegiate title...Had four top-five finishes playing for the University of North Texas.
tourBios.personal: Attended Burleson (Texas) High School...Attended McLennan Community College prior to enrolling at the University of North Texas...Has been a volunteer assistant coach for McLennan Community College since 2009...Was a petroleum landman in 2010-2012...If not a golf professional, would be a college coach or pro hunter...Biggest thrill in golf was hitting his first shot at 2012 U.S. Open...Favorite courses are The Olympic Club and Dallas National, Woodmont CC and Whispering Pines...Would like to play Muirfield Village and Augusta National...Lucky charm is 1921 silver dollar given to him by his grandparents...Likes Marquette and the Unviversity of North Carolina basketball teams...Favorite pro teams are the Dallas Cowboys, Dallas Mavericks, Texas Rangers and Dallas Stars...Favorite movies are "Tin Cup, "Caddyshack" and "The Dark Knight."...Favorite TV shows are "Breaking Bad" and "The Office."...Favorite athletes are Michael Jordan, LeBron James and Drew Brees...Favor city is Denver...Would like to trade places with a homeless person for a day "to undertand his struggle."...Not many people know he won the first college tournament he played...Bucket list includes swimming with the sharks in South Africa with his college roommates and playing in the Masters...First tee intro song would be " 'Till I Collaspe" by Eminem...Twitter name is @colechoward85.

tourBios.carHigh: 2013: Won the Hearthstone Winter on the Adams Golf Tour during their 2013-14 Winters Series.
